data.title: Bookings, timetables and information
data.meta_description: Welcome to Orkney Ferries. Our 9 dedicated Inter-Island ferries operate between Orkney's mainland and thirteen beautiful island destinations.
data.text:
NORTH ISLES SERVICES - STRONSAY MASSIVE WEEKEND - SATURDAY 17 & SUNDAY 18 AUGUST

14/08/2024 13:58

We would like to remind customers that scheduled North Isles sailings have been changed to allow travel to this event

For full details of timetable changes, please see Sailings for Special Events | Orkney Ferries

For the latest updates, head to our website or social media feeds

NEW SCAPA FLOW SERVICE – COMMENCING MONDAY 8TH JULY

15/07/2024 13:11

We are delighted to share with customers our new foot passenger service which will sail between Stromness, Lyness & Flotta provided by the M.V. Nordic Sea.

This service will commence on Monday 8th July and will depart from the same place the M.V. Graemsay does in Stromness. The timetable can be found in our timetables page and will run until the end of the summer timetable.

All passengers wishing to utilise this service must book and pay in advance.

We hope that this new route will relieve pressure from our Houton service during the summer months and give passengers more flexibility with their travel.

PREBOOKING ADVISEMENT – ALL SERVICES

18/04/2024 10:45

We would like to remind customers that it is advisable to book all journeys even if you are travelling as foot passengers without vehicles.

We have recently noticed a large influx of foot passengers on our services. Prebooking avoids disappointment and ensures customers are guaranteed their space onboard.

This is particularly important as we move into our busiest time of year.

You can make bookings online - https://www.orkneyferries.co.uk/, or you can phone any of our offices to make your bookings - Orkney Ferries | Contact Us.

Houton & Tingwall Car Parking

01/06/2024 07:00

We would like to remind all passengers of the limited parking spaces at our Tingwall and Houton terminals

If you are travelling as a foot passenger, we would encourage you to make use of the bus services provided by Stagecoach

Book a Ferry

If you know when and where you want to travel, our booking system makes it easy to arrange your trip online. Simply click Book Now and register for an account to get started. If you are unsure of travel options or still exploring possible destinations, you can use the section above to search timetables and availability before booking.
